column4: can someone help me?
I upgrade ubuntu from 10.10 to 11.04
and then the ubuntu got crazy !
what exactly is the problem?
I can to log in but after that ubuntu become very slow  and then stuck
I can to log in but after that ubuntu become very slow  and then stuck
can you use gnome-system-monitor to see which program is making your system slow?
ok then I have to tell you which one of it?
and which season do I need to use?in safe mode it works well but it doesn't find anything just searching
if you sort by cpu usage, can you find a program which is taking up most of ur cpu time?
It can't open the terminal
also, could be your ram is low so the system might be using swap
no it doesn't I don't see any writing on the hard disk
do you see any program which is eating up your cpu?
I can't
I think that the wireless program because it run well in safe mode
hmm, I'm not sure then ;/
what should I do?ask in the forums of ubuntu?
you could try, there might also be someone in here who knows more about the problem
if your /home directory is on a seperate partition, you can reinstall 10.10 w/o deleting your files/settings
I can downgrade without connection to internet?
you'll have to download the 10.10 CD
